name: Gemcrate
description:
Gemcrate is an attempt to recapture some of the fun and magic had when playing similar match-3 games in the golden era of Mac shareware. The result is a faithful adaption of those games, brought into the modern age of indie game-dev.

Try to keep up and keep your crate from over-flowing, as ever more gems spill in from the top, and learn to spot matches quickly as they spill in ever faster. Of course, always be on the look out for Onyx, as it holds secrets the others don't.

Full game-play help and control layout available in-game.

Developed with the Godot game engine.

System Requirements

  • Support for GLES3
